item.title: IBM Model 3278 (Beamspring)
item.description: At the time of writting, this old beamer is the prize of my collection. I have acquired this from a DT member who let it go for a fair enough price. They were kind enough to send me an metal(iron) door with the board too. Initially, I liked the battered look of the board, but after a while, I powder coated it to black. I couldn’t find an “olive-green” or “matte-black” color, So I settled for Glossy black.
